pkgmetadata.longdescription: Data Science for Wind Energy // Data science methods used in wind energy applications. Current functionalities include creating a multi-dimensional power curve model, performing power curve function comparison, and covariate matching. Relevant works for the developed functions are: funGP() - Prakash et al. (2020) arxiv:2003.07899, AMK() - Lee et al. (2015) doi:10.1080/01621459.2014.977385, tempGP() - Prakash et al. (2020) arxiv:2012.01349, ComparePCurve() - Ding et al. (2020) arxiv:2005.08652, All other functions - Ding (2019, ISBN:9780429956508).
